participant_1.background:
I dress professionally for work and wear comfortable clothes on vacation.
i need to use an inhaler sometimes.
I take my dog for a walk in the park before I head to work at the museum.
i have a lot of allergies.
i work as a veterinarians assistant.

participant_2.background:
I maintained a healthy weight last year.
i am very popular and have a lot of friends.
I rent an apartment near my favorite sushi bar.
I am indifferent to the weather.
I listened to my favorite songs on my tablet while getting ready for my last birthday.

content.text: Hi there!  Happy New Year!  How was yours?
Hi, you too! It was great, I celebrated with all my friends.
We went to a sushi bar and played some games.
Me too! I'm trying to keep a healthy weight this year, so I'm trying to eat more healthy foods.
That's great! I have a lot of allergies, so I have to be careful about what I eat too.
Oh no, that's tough. What kind of allergies do you have?
I'm allergic to a lot of things, but the worst is pollen.
Oh, I know what you mean. I'm allergic to cats and dogs.
That's tough too. I have a dog, so I have to be really careful about cleaning up after him.
I'm sure it's worth it to have a dog. They're so cute and cuddly.
They are! I love my dog.
I'm glad you have a good dog to help you through your allergies.
